dataflow.referenceName: Load DMRL Workorder Data to SQL

activities.name: Export DMRL Container Data From Dataverse to Blob

dependsOn.activity: DMRLWorkorder_Snapshot Data From ADX To Staging Blob

source.query:
<fetch >
  <entity name="maersk_dmrlcontainer">
    <attribute name="maersk_dmrlcontainerid" />
    <attribute name="maersk_name" />
    <attribute name="maersk_profile" />
    <attribute name="maersk_equipmentreefertype" />
    <attribute name="maersk_equipmentmanufacturer" />
    <order attribute="maersk_equipmentreefertype" descending="true" />
    <order attribute="maersk_equipmentmanufacturer" descending="true" />
  </entity>
</fetch>

activities.name: DMRLWorkorder_Snapshot Data From ADX To Staging Blob

source.query:
work_order_mrl_hubble_snapshot 
| join kind=leftouter 
(work_order | project shop_id,status_description, wolocation_id = location_id,cluster_id,work_order_id,total_cost_usd) on work_order_id  
| project work_order_id,container_id,is_sales,is_surplus,equipment_size,location_id,last_move_timestamp,is_empty,last_move,
equipment_redelivery_status,adjusted_MRL,adjusted_MRL_box,total_cost_with_maersk_parts_usd,total_price_not_covered_by_warranty,
total_cost_under_warranty,expiry_date,should_repair,reasoning_for_rejection,work_order_created_date,urgent,shop_id,cluster_id, wolocation_id,total_cost_usd,status_description
|join kind=leftouter 
(work_orders_with_repair_limits | project work_order_id,would_repair_after_change,would_repair_before_change) on work_order_id  
|extend over_mrl = iif(work_order_created_date > datetime(2020-03-27), would_repair_after_change == false, would_repair_before_change == false)

source.query:
work_order_mrl_hubble_snapshot 
| join kind=leftouter 
(work_order | project shop_id,status_description, wolocation_id = location_id,cluster_id,work_order_id,total_cost_usd) on work_order_id  
| project work_order_id,container_id,is_sales,is_surplus,equipment_size,location_id,last_move_timestamp,is_empty,last_move,
equipment_redelivery_status,adjusted_MRL,adjusted_MRL_box,total_cost_with_maersk_parts_usd,total_price_not_covered_by_warranty,
total_cost_under_warranty,expiry_date,should_repair,reasoning_for_rejection,work_order_created_date,urgent,shop_id,cluster_id, wolocation_id,total_cost_usd,status_description
|join kind=leftouter 
(work_orders_with_repair_limits | project work_order_id,would_repair_after_change,would_repair_before_change) on work_order_id  
|extend over_mrl = iif(work_order_created_date > datetime(2020-03-27), would_repair_after_change == false, would_repair_before_change == false)

    <attribute name="maersk_name" />

source.query:

    <attribute name="maersk_containertosaleid" />
    <attribute name="maersk_name" />

</fetch>

activities.name: Copy Potential Container To Sell data to Dataverse

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ForceFullRefresh as boolean (false())
}
source(output(
		ContainerNo as string,
		MRLUnit as decimal(38,18),
		MRLBox as decimal(38,18),
		ContainerType as string,
		EquipmentManufacturer as string,
		isSales as boolean,
		isSurplus as boolean,
		Location as string,
		ProductionYear as string,
		reasoning as string,
		DamagePrediction as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['dmrlcontainer']) ~> StagingBlobDMRLContainer
source(output(
		maersk_country as string,
		maersk_siteid as string,
		maersk_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['sitecsp/*.parquet']) ~> sitedatafromblob
source(output(
		maersk_reasoning as string,
		maersk_location as string,
		maersk_dmrlcontainerid as string,
		maersk_mrlbox as integer,
		maersk_equipmentmanufacturer as string,
		maersk_productionyear as string,
		maersk_issurplus as boolean,
		maersk_name as string,
		maersk_issales as boolean,
		maersk_mrlunit as integer,
		maersk_damageprediction as double,
		maersk_containertype as string,
		maersk_datahash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['dmrlcontainer']) ~> dataverseData
source(output(
		container_id as string,
		equipment_reefer_type as string,
		current_location_id as string,
		equipment_own_type as string,
		is_empty as boolean,
		equipment_leasing_company as string,
		move as string,
		location_id as string,
		move_timestamp as timestamp,
		equipment_leasing_contract_id as string,
		profile as string,
		payload_weight as string,
		equipment_group as string,
		production_year as string,
		container_status as string,
		equipment_infleet_year as integer,
		lease_start_date as timestamp,
		lease_end_date as timestamp,
		total_cost_usd_lifetime as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['dmrlcontaineradx']) ~> StagingBlobDMRLContainerADX
StagingBlobDMRLContainer derive(ContainerNo = trim(toString(byName('ContainerNo'))),
		MRLUnit = toInteger(byName('MRLUnit')),
		MRLBox = toInteger(byName('MRLBox')),
		ContainerType = trim(toString(byName('ContainerType'))),
		EquipmentManufacturer = trim(toString(byName('EquipmentManufacturer'))),
		isSales = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('isSales'))))=='TRUE',"1","0")),
		isSurplus = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('isSurplus'))))=='TRUE',"1","0")),
		Location = trim(toString(byName('Location'))),
		ProductionYear = trim(toString(byName('ProductionYear'))),
		reasoning = trim(toString(byName('reasoning'))),
		DamagePrediction = toDouble(byName('DamagePrediction'))) ~> DataTransformation
DataTransformation, sitedatafromblob lookup(Location == maersk_name,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupLocation
LookupLocation select(mapColumn(
		ContainerNo,
		MRLUnit,
		MRLBox,
		ContainerType,
		EquipmentManufacturer,
		isSales,
		isSurplus,
		ProductionYear,
		reasoning,
		DamagePrediction,
		Location = maersk_siteid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectLocation
SelectRequiredCoulmns derive(checksum = sha1(columns('SelectRequiredCoulmns'))) ~> checksum
checksum, dataverseData join(ContainerNo == maersk_name,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> RelateTwoDatasets
FilterOnlyNewRows select(mapColumn(
		ContainerNo,
		MRLUnit,
		MRLBox,
		ContainerType,
		EquipmentManufacturer,
		isSales,
		isSurplus,
		reasoning,
		DamagePrediction,
		Location,
		current_location_id,
		equipment_own_type,
		is_empty,
		equipment_leasing_company,
		move,
		location_id,
		move_timestamp,
		equipment_leasing_contract_id,
		profile,
		payload_weight,
		equipment_group,
		checksum,
		container_status,
		production_year = ProductionYear,
		total_cost_usd_lifetime,
		lease_end_date,
		lease_start_date,
		equipment_infleet_year,
		equipment_reefer_type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRowColumns
RelateTwoDatasets filter(case($ForceFullRefresh==true(), true(), case(maersk_datahash==checksum, false(), true()))) ~> FilterOnlyNewRows
StagingBlobDMRLContainerADX derive(container_id = trim(toString(byName('container_id'))),
		current_location_id = trim(toString(byName('current_location_id'))),
		equipment_own_type = trim(toString(byName('equipment_own_type'))),
		is_empty = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('is_empty'))))=='TRUE',"1","0")),
		equipment_leasing_company = trim(toString(byName('equipment_leasing_company'))),
		move = case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='GATE-IN',379430000,
    case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='GATE-OUT',379430001,
        case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='DISCHARG',379430002,
            case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='LOAD',379430003,
                case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='ON-RAIL',379430004,
                    case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='OFF-RAIL',379430005,
                        case(trim(toString(byName('move')))=='STRIPPIN',379430006))))))),
		location_id = trim(toString(byName('location_id'))),
		move_timestamp = toTimestamp(toString(byName('move_timestamp'))),
		equipment_leasing_contract_id = trim(toString(byName('equipment_leasing_contract_id'))),
		profile = trim(toString(byName('profile'))),
		payload_weight = trim(toString(byName('payload_weight'))),
		equipment_group = trim(toString(byName('equipment_group'))),
		production_year = trim(toString(byName('production_year'))),
		container_status = trim(toString(byName('container_status'))),
		equipment_infleet_year = trim(toString(byName('equipment_infleet_year'))),
		lease_end_date = case(year(lease_end_date) > 1753, lease_end_date),
		lease_start_date = case(year(lease_start_date) > 1753, lease_start_date),
		total_cost_usd_lifetime = toDouble(byName('total_cost_usd_lifetime')),
		equipment_reefer_type = trim(toString(byName('equipment_reefer_type')))) ~> DataTransformationDMRLContainerADX
SelectLocation, DataTransformationDMRLContainerADX join(ContainerNo == container_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDMRLContainerAndDMRLContainerADX
JoinDMRLContainerAndDMRLContainerADX select(mapColumn(
		ContainerNo,
		MRLUnit,
		MRLBox,
		ContainerType,
		EquipmentManufacturer,
		isSales,
		isSurplus,
		ProductionYear,
		reasoning,
		DamagePrediction,
		Location,
		current_location_id,
		equipment_own_type,
		is_empty,
		equipment_leasing_company,
		move,
		location_id,
		move_timestamp,
		equipment_leasing_contract_id,
		profile,
		payload_weight,
		equipment_group,
		production_year,
		container_status,
		equipment_infleet_year,
		lease_start_date,
		lease_end_date,
		total_cost_usd_lifetime,
		equipment_reefer_type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequiredCoulmns
dataverseData, DataTransformation exists(maersk_name == ContainerNo,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> DMRLContainersDoesNotExistsInADX
DMRLContainersDoesNotExistsInADX select(mapColumn(
		maersk_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectName
SelectName derive(maersk_stagefordelete = true()) ~> AddStageForDeleteFlag
SelectNewRowColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IntermediateBlobDMRLContainer
AddStageForDeleteFlag sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkToStageDeletion

parameters{
	ForceFullRefresh as boolean (false())
}
source(output(
		work_order_id as string,
		container_id as string,
		is_sales as boolean,
		is_surplus as boolean,
		equipment_size as string,
		location_id as string,
		last_move_timestamp as timestamp,
		is_empty as boolean,
		last_move as string,
		equipment_redelivery_status as boolean,
		adjusted_MRL as decimal(38,18),
		adjusted_MRL_box as decimal(38,18),
		total_cost_with_maersk_parts_usd as double,
		total_price_not_covered_by_warranty as double,
		total_cost_under_warranty as double,
		expiry_date as string,
		should_repair as boolean,
		reasoning_for_rejection as string,
		work_order_created_date as timestamp,
		urgent as boolean,
		shop_id as string,
		cluster_id as string,
		wolocation_id as string,
		total_cost_usd as double,
		status_description as string,
		work_order_id1 as string,
		would_repair_after_change as boolean,
		would_repair_before_change as boolean,
		over_mrl as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['dmrlworkorder']) ~> StagingBlobDMRLWorkorderSnapshot
source(output(
		maersk_name as string,
		maersk_dmrlcontainerid as string,
		maersk_equipmentreefertype as string,
		maersk_equipmentmanufacturer as string,
		maersk_profile as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['dmrlcontainer']) ~> dmrlcontainerdatafromblob
source(output(
		work_order_id as string,
		checksum as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'query',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	query: 'SELECT  work_order_id, checksum\nFROM dbo.DMRL_Workorder',
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED') ~> ASQLWorkorder
StagingBlobDMRLWorkorderSnapshot derive(work_order_id = trim(toString(byName('work_order_id'))),
		container_id = trim(toString(byName('container_id'))),
		is_sales = byName('is_sales'),
		is_surplus = byName('is_surplus'),
		equipment_size = case(toInteger(byName('equipment_size'))==20,379430000,
    case(toInteger(byName('equipment_size'))==40,379430001,
        case(toInteger(byName('equipment_size'))==45,379430002))),
		wolocation_id = trim(toString(byName('location_id'))),
		last_move_timestamp = toTimestamp(toString(byName('last_move_timestamp'))),
		is_empty = byName('is_empty'),
		last_move = case(trim(toString(byName('last_move')))=='GATE-IN',379430000,
    case(trim(toString(byName('last_move')))=='GATE-OUT',379430001,
        case(trim(toString(byName('last_move')))=='DISCHARG',379430002,
            case(trim(toString(byName('last_move')))=='LOAD',379430003,
                case(trim(toString(byName('last_move')))=='ON-RAIL',379430004,
                    case(trim(toString(byName('last_move')))=='OFF-RAIL',379430005,
                        case(trim(toString(byName('last_move')))=='STRIPPIN',379430006))))))),
		equipment_redelivery_status = byName('equipment_redelivery_status'),
		adjusted_MRL = toInteger(byName('adjusted_MRL')),
		adjusted_MRL_box = toInteger(byName('adjusted_MRL_box')),
		total_cost_with_maersk_parts_usd = toInteger(byName('total_cost_with_maersk_parts_usd')),
		total_price_not_covered_by_warranty = toInteger(byName('total_price_not_covered_by_warranty')),
		total_cost_under_warranty = toInteger(byName('total_cost_under_warranty')),
		expiry_date = toTimestamp(toString(byName('expiry_date')),'yyyy-mm-dd'),
		should_repair = byName('should_repair'),
		reasoning_for_rejection = trim(toString(byName('reasoning_for_rejection'))),
		work_order_created_date = toTimestamp(toString(byName('work_order_created_date'))),
		urgent = byName('urgent'),
		shop_id = trim(toString(byName('shop_id'))),
		cluster_id = trim(toString(byName('cluster_id'))),
		total_cost_usd = toFloat(byName('total_cost_usd')),
		status_description = trim(toString(byName('status_description'))),
		over_mrl = byName('over_mrl')) ~> DataTransformation
IfWODoesNotExistsInADX, dmrlcontainerdatafromblob lookup(container_id == maersk_name,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDMRLContainerId
LookupDMRLContainerId select(mapColumn(
		work_order_id,
		container_id = maersk_dmrlcontainerid,
		is_sales,
		is_surplus,
		equipment_size,
		last_move_timestamp,
		is_empty,
		last_move,
		equipment_redelivery_status,
		adjusted_MRL,
		adjusted_MRL_box,
		total_cost_with_maersk_parts_usd,
		total_price_not_covered_by_warranty,
		total_cost_under_warranty,
		expiry_date,
		should_repair,
		reasoning_for_rejection,
		work_order_created_date,
		urgent,
		shop_id,
		cluster_id,
		wolocation_id,
		total_cost_usd,
		status_description,
		checksum = adxchecksum,
		over_mrl,
		EquipmentManufacturer = maersk_equipmentmanufacturer,
		profile = maersk_profile,
		equipment_reefer_type = maersk_equipmentreefertype
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDMRLContainerId
ADXChecksum, ASQLWorkorder exists(adxchecksum == checksum
	&& DataTransformation@work_order_id == ASQLWorkorder@work_order_id,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IfWODoesNotExistsInADX
DataTransformation derive(adxchecksum = sha1(work_order_id,over_mrl,container_id,is_sales,is_surplus,equipment_size,last_move_timestamp,is_empty,last_move,equipment_redelivery_status,adjusted_MRL,adjusted_MRL_box,total_cost_with_maersk_parts_usd,total_price_not_covered_by_warranty,total_cost_under_warranty,expiry_date,should_repair,reasoning_for_rejection,work_order_created_date,urgent,shop_id,cluster_id, wolocation_id,total_cost_usd)) ~> ADXChecksum
SelectDMRLContainerId alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterToUpsert
AlterToUpsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	schemaName: 'dbo',
	tableName: 'DMRL_Workorder',
	insertable: false,
	updateable: false,
	deletable: false,
	upsertable: true,
	keys:['work_order_id'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 0) ~> destSQL
